product_name: Mountain Hardwear Ascent Stretch Air Permeable Gaiters
long_description: Keep snow and rocks out of your boots with these all-purpose Mountain Hardwear Ascent Stretch gaiters. The upper and lower shells of gaiters are constructed from taslan and packcloth nylons for durability and wind and water resistance. 4-way stretch nylon soft-shell rear panels provide a form-fitting seal over your boots; plus, they're breathable. Low-profile VELCRO(R) brand front flap closes securely; top cuff cinches tight with nylon webbing adjustment. Pinless boot straps ensure a secure fit underfoot and won't break in the field.
short_description: Keep snow and rocks out of your boots with these all-purpose Mountain Hardwear Ascent Stretch gaiters.
